body_html:
Commit message now reads

Variable: add support for friendly names
Add a "name" named parameter to the Variable constructor in python. When
supplied, the unique name of the corresponding Node will be
"<name parameter>_<unique integer id>". Names are not required to be
unique across Variables, since the integer id suffix allows
disambiguating between them.

Add a "name" named parameter to the Variable constructor in python. When

unique across Variables, since the integer id suffix allows
disambiguating between them.
body:
Commit message now reads

```
Variable: add support for friendly names
Add a "name" named parameter to the Variable constructor in python. When
supplied, the unique name of the corresponding Node will be
"<name parameter>_<unique integer id>". Names are not required to be
unique across Variables, since the integer id suffix allows
disambiguating between them.
```
